article: palestinian leader mahmoud abbas has conditioned ending the current crisis in the gaza strip with the radical islamic resistance movement -lrb- hamas -rrb- by a full commitment to the calmness or truce declared in march in cairo .
abstract: abbas says commitment to truce a condition to end crisis
